snippet: Peyton Hillis was a surprisingly controversial player last season. He leads this free-agent group, but happy or unhappy, Hillis isn't the type of player you give a meaty long-term deal.
abstract: Peyton Hillis was a surprisingly controversial player last season. He leads this free-agent group, but happy or unhappy, Hillis isn't the type of player you give a meaty long-term deal.

headline.main: Top 10 Running Backs in Free Agency
